entry.title: Combined summary - Transifex administration
entry.summary: Felipe Micaroni Lalli has sent a message to Transifex requesting information on how he can become a maintainer, admin, or reviewer of the Bitcoin project. In his message, Lalli expresses his desire to improve the project description and logo in order to attract more contributors. He also mentions that he has completed 35% of missing translations and wishes to review translations in Brazilian Portuguese. To ensure accuracy, Lalli plans to use documentation from various sources. Lalli provides his contact information and PGP ID in the signature to facilitate communication with the Transifex team.
